info.name: minimalistic Voxel
info.description:
A fork of https://www.shadertoy.com/view/NtfXWS
which is a fork of https://www.shadertoy.com/view/3sKXDK
whish is an implementation of http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/download?doi=10.1.1.42.3443&rep=rep1&type=pdf

renderpass.code:
//Thanks to @FabriceNeyret2, this code became 392 chars
//but return's return shrinks it to 390
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 U ) 
{   
	vec3 R = iResolution, 
         v = 256. +R-R, //resolution of voxels
         M = iMouse.xyz / R, //  â†“ horizontal angle
         f = normalize( vec3(cos(iTime*.1 + M.x*8.+vec2(0,11)), .2 + M.y)).xzy,
         l = vec3(-f.z,0,f),
         D = normalize( mat3(l, cross(f,l), f) * (vec3(U,R.y)-.5*R) ), //ray direction
         P = .5 * v * f, //ray position
         s = sign(D),
         d = s / D, //delta
         c = fract(P*s) * d;
 
    for (; //raymarch
         f = ceil(P) / v,
         O = texture(iChannel0, f.xz),
         l.y++ < 1e3;   
         R = step(c,min(c.yzx,c.zxy)), 
         P -= s*R , 
         c += d*R
        )
        if(f.y * 16. < O.g) return; //texture's green is used as height
    O = vec4(0,.5,.8,0) + D.y; //sky
}
